This is a picturesque and exquisite 24-room beach hotel, surrounded by lush palms and turquoise beaches of fine white sand. It is ideal for couples and families. Guests are welcomed into a lobby with 24-hour reception and check-out services. The hotel has facilities to make guests' stay unforgettable, as well as a hotel safe, hairdressing salon, TV lounge, café, bar and restaurant. All rooms have en suite bathrooms with a shower and hairdryer. Rooms are furnished with double or king-size beds. In-room amenities include a direct dial telephone, satellite/cable TV, radio, safe and Internet access. There is also a minibar for refreshments and an ironing set. Individually regulated air conditioning and individually regulated heating are standard features in all accommodation. All rooms have their own balcony or terrace.

Guests can take a refreshing dip in the hotel's swimming pool and the hotel is also just 3 minutes from the famous Cocotal Golf Course and Country Club in Punta Cana. Guests can relax on sun loungers under parasols on the sandy beach.

The hotel serves breakfast to its guests and dinner may be selected à la carte.
